name: Standard Room
roomDescription: Our comfortable Standard Room offers a cozy retreat with a queen-sized bed and modern amenities.

name: Luxury Suite
specialOffers: Complimentary spa treatment with your stay
roomDescription: Indulge in opulence with our spacious Luxury Suite, featuring a king-sized bed, a private lounge, and a marble bathroom.

name: Ocean View Room
specialOffers: Enjoy a sunset cruise with your booking
roomDescription: Wake up to breathtaking ocean views in our Ocean View Room, complete with a balcony, a comfortable bed, and a luxurious bathroom.

name: Presidential Suite
specialOffers: Personal butler service and limousine airport transfer
roomDescription: Experience true luxury in our Presidential Suite, with a spacious living area, a grand bedroom, a private dining room, and panoramic city views.

name: Garden Bungalow
specialOffers: Stay 3 nights, get the 4th night free
roomDescription: Escape to a serene Garden Bungalow, nestled in lush greenery, offering a private garden, a king-sized bed, and an outdoor shower.

name: Business Suite
specialOffers: Complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi and executive lounge access
roomDescription: Ideal for business travelers, our Business Suite features a spacious workspace, a comfortable bed, and access to exclusive amenities.
